code:
gantt
    title Debouncing: Wait for User to Stop Typing
    dateFormat X
    axisFormat %L
    
    section Without Debounce
    Type 'M' - API Call     :milestone, 0, 0ms
    Type 'a' - API Call     :milestone, 100, 100ms
    Type 'n' - API Call     :milestone, 200, 200ms
    Type 'i' - API Call     :milestone, 300, 300ms
    Type 'l' - API Call     :milestone, 400, 400ms
    Type 'a' - API Call     :milestone, 500, 500ms
    
    section With Debounce (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
    Type 'M'                :0, 100ms
    Type 'a'                :100, 200ms
    Type 'n'                :200, 300ms
    Type 'i'                :300, 400ms
    Type 'l'                :400, 500ms
    Type 'a'                :500, 600ms
    Wait 500ms              :600, 1100ms
    API Call                :milestone, 1100, 1100ms
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，Generic Diagram就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Generic Diagram应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Generic Diagram结束。
